thread.title: BRIEF-Gulf Island’S Shipyard Division To Build Up To Four Additional Z-Tech 30-80 Terminal/Escort Tugs

title: BRIEF-Gulf Island’S Shipyard Division To Build Up To Four Additional Z-Tech 30-80 Terminal/Escort Tugs
text:
May 1, 2018 / 4:57 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Gulf Island’S Shipyard Division To Build Up To Four Additional Z-Tech 30-80 Terminal/Escort Tugs Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Gulf Island Fabrication Inc:
* GULF ISLAND’S SHIPYARD DIVISION TO BUILD UP TO FOUR ADDITIONAL Z-TECH 30-80 TERMINAL/ESCORT TUGS
* GULF ISLAND FABRICATION - RECEIVED FOLLOW-ON CHANGE ORDERS FROM BAY-HOUSTON TOWING COMPANY AND SUDERMAN & YOUNG TOWING COMPANY FOR ADDITIONAL TUGS
* GULF ISLAND FABRICATION INC - EXPECT TO BEGIN DELIVERIES IN LATE 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
